aka: กระชากลากโคตร

cast.name: 苏赫·阿里温边巴 Sukhee Ariunbyamba

trans_title: กระชากลากโคตร
introduction: Separated by a tragic family event, siblings Tumur and Jargal reunite when their father is released from prison, bringing painful memories back to the surface. Following an unknown sacrifice by their father, Tumur is haunted by dark nightmares and a family curse rooted in an ancient accident, which nearly costs him his life.After surgery in Thailand, they travel back to Mongolia to confront the past and break the curse before it claims more lives. But even as they seek answers, the haunting visions persist, leaving them uncertain whether the curse can truly be escaped.
